caption.title: Gel electropherograms of influenza A, B and IC (actin beta) RT-LAMP products.
caption.p: Influenza A/B virus clinical samples, non-infection human serum RNA and distilled water (DW) were tested by RT-LAMP assays with monoplex influenza A RT-LAMP primer set (A), monoplex influenza B RT-LAMP primer set (B) and monoplex IC (actin beta) RT-LAMP primer set (C). Lane M: DNA ladder marker, Lane 1: Influenza A/H1, Lane 2: Influenza A/H1N1, Lane 3: Influenza A/H3N2, Lane 4: Influenza B, Lane 5: Non-infection human serum RNA and Lane 6: DW (negative control).
Click here for additional data file.
